name: noitanigami
description:
Yeah! 2nd little 'game' and 2nd #gamejam solo made in less 1 month. A weird pointclick about halloween, aliens and gardening.  All from scratch... my idea, art, music... most SFX from freesound.org. Used Krita, Blender, Unity and Ableton Lite. Sorry about  bugs and things, I'm learning.

Feel free to report any game breaker bug or give feedback <3

Have fun and thank you @Darktober. Happy halloween!

Thank you AlphaBetaGamer for the review and gameplay video.  <3
https://www.alphabetagamer.com/noitanigami-game-jam-build/

BUGS (fixed I think):
Don't give the snail the eye twice.
Don't change scene while inventory item is flying back to the bat.
